segments.text: Come on , Jenny , we are heading our way to the Opera House .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am dead tired and I can't walk any further .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I am sorry , I thought you were not .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't we stop and have a rest here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . Actually I am a little tired too . Want some water ?
segments.speaker: S1
